thumb.title: Säfsen
thumb.description: I tried snowboarding for the first time last year (2023). So maybe, recording these rides would be a cool thing to do since many of these landscapes are very beautiful. Also an opportunity for me to learn DaVinci Resolve properly.00:00 Off the ski lift 00:56 Day ride06:24 Waiting... (last ride of the day)07:40 Fog ride11:05 Ohh no@haraldrevery Säfsen 2024
